name: Malfortune
description: A twin-stick shooter where your actions have consequences. Engage in blood-pumping boss fights, soothing casual puzzles, and chats with quirky locals. This planet's fate lies in your capable, albeit confused, hands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 150 MB available space
